title: Passing through Sweden
creator_credit: Martin Duckworth, John Kemeny, Joseph Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A film critic of one of Sweden’s daily newspapers says of this film by Martin Duckworth, “Never before have I seen a film that so intensely interpreted the experience of Swedish surroundings … an atmosphere film” in which all the expression is in the pictures.
creator_credit_for_label: Martin Duckworth, John Kemeny, Joseph Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
